price: "Yã bãba! Lalle ne ni inã tsõron wata azãba daga Mai rahama ta shãfe ka, har ka zama masõyi ga Shaiɗan."
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāabati innī akhāfu an yamassaka ʿadhābun mina al-raḥmāni fatakūna lilshayṭāni waliyyan
